item.title: Install and execute Openpose on Jetson Tx2
item.description: Install Jetpack 3.3 on Jetson Tx2 There’s a lot of resources to do. I used this link. The post used Virtual box and virtual box extension. Install OpenPose To use jetson tx2 onboard camera, it is necessary to install opencv3.4. First, I removed prior version of opencv according to this article. $ sudo apt-get purge libopencv* $ sudo apt-get purge python-numpy I used shell script to install opencv 3.
